segments.text: I'm glancing at this kitchen drawing, taking it all in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is focused on her plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the sink is flooding over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading down, pooling at her feet without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the left, the cabinet's open with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is up on the stool, hand deep in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whoa, that stool is tippingâ€” he could fall any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, arm raised, ready for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a neat garden, sunlight streaming in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how the outside calm contrasts the inside frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the water will reach the kids' area soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This setup is equal parts routine and risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron on the woman adds a homey touch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a snapshot of everyday hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such mischief in a simple kitchen view.
segments.speaker: PAR
